# About Jekyll Theme Gallery Welcome to the Jekyll Theme Gallery, your go-to resource for discovering beautiful and functional Jekyll themes. ## Our Mission We curate and showcase the best Jekyll themes to help developers, designers, and content creators find the perfect starting point for their projects. Every theme in our collection is selected for its quality, design, and functionality. ## What is Jekyll? Jekyll is a static site generator that transforms plain text into static websites and blogs. It's: - Simple and blog-aware - No database required - GitHub Pages compatible - Markdown support - Fast and secure ## How to Use This Gallery 1. **Browse Themes**: Explore our collection using the category filters 2. **Preview**: Click "Demo" to see the theme in action 3. **Download**: Use the "Download" button to get the theme from GitHub 4. **Customize**: Follow the theme's documentation to make it your own 5. **Deploy**: Publish to GitHub Pages or any static hosting service ## Categories Our themes are organized into several categories: - **Blog**: Perfect for personal blogs and content-focused sites - **Portfolio**: Showcase your creative work and projects - **Documentation**: Technical documentation and knowledge bases - **Business**: Professional websites for businesses and startups ## Contributing Have a theme you'd like to submit? We welcome contributions from the community! Visit our GitHub repository to learn how to submit your theme for consideration. ## Get Started Ready to build your Jekyll site? Head back to the [gallery](/) to find your perfect theme!
